arts.ttl: Burnley's Hannibal accuses Preston's Osmajic of racial abuse
arts.sum: Burnley midfielder Hannibal Mejbri accuses Preston forward Milutin Osmajic of racially abusing him during Saturday's Championship match at Deepdale.

arts.ttl: Burnley's Mejbri accuses opponent of racism
arts.sum: Burnley midfielder Hannibal Mejbri has said he suffered "disgusting abuse" in a Championship match on Saturday amid an investigation into an alleged racist comment from Preston North End's Milutin Osmajic.

arts.ttl: Burnley's Hannibal accuses Preston's Osmajic of racial abuse
arts.sum: Burnley midfielder Hannibal Mejbri accuses Preston forward Milutin Osmajic of racially abusing him during Saturday's Championship match at Deepdale.

arts.ttl: Burnley's Hannibal speaks out on Milutin Osmajic incident as Preston North End release own statement
arts.sum: Hannibal has pledged he will not be silenced after being on the receiving end of an alleged racist comment from Preston North End’s Milutin Osmajic.

arts.ttl: Burnley player says he received 'disgusting' racial abuse from opponent
arts.sum: Burnley manager Scott Parker, whose team has not conceded a goal in 11 league games, said his player was clearly affected by whatever Osmajic said. A player for English second-division team Burnley says he received “disgusting” racial abuse from an opponent during a league game on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Burnley's Hannibal alleges racist abuse as Osmajic and Preston issue denial
arts.sum: Hannibal Mejbri says he suffered "disgusting abuse" amid an investigation into an alleged racist comment from Milutin Osmajic in Burnley's Championship draw with Preston.

arts.ttl: The stats behind Burnley's 1,000 minutes without conceding
arts.sum: BBC Sport looks at the stats behind Burnley going 1,000 minutes without conceding a goal in the Championship.

arts.ttl: Hannibal Mejbri left 'hurt' after Milutin Osmajic incident as Burnley release statement
arts.sum: Burnley drew 0-0 with Preston but the match was overshadowed by an incident between Hannibal Mejbri and Milutin Osmajic, with the ex-Manchester United star claiming he was verbally abused by the Preston player

arts.ttl: Burnley player ratings vs Preston North End as two 8/10s and two 5/10s dished out after derby draw - gallery
arts.sum: Burnley were held to a frustrating derby draw against Preston North End after failing to make the most of their chances in front of goal.

arts.ttl: Burnley FC release statement on Hannibal incident with Preston North End's Milutin Osmajic as investigation launched
arts.sum: Burnley FC have confirmed they have reported the incident involving Hannibal and Preston North End’s Milutin Osmajic during today’s feisty derby to the officials.
